desc: 150% boost to Def, considerably boosts damage reduced while guarding, slight probability of reducing damage taken to 1, boosts OD gauge fill rate, probable damage reduction, boosts Atk and Def by 40% relative to max HP & lowers Atk by 50%

dictionary.lore: As suspicion and paranoia mounted, Maestron's minions emerged in force from their hiding places during the siege. His cultists sowed death and destruction in Rehdoon's homes, each body heaped onto sacrificial pyres as reinforcements poured through portals opened in midair. As the defenders began their counterattack, his demons withdrew from the city, tainting the land in their retreat. His view of his rivals was thus: "Cultivating human desire is a feat that anyone could do. Why Malachus insists on such childishly short plans is not worth my time."

name: Foolish Desire
